General.Name: Zhejiang Huangma Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Huangma Technology Co.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells surfactants and other related products in China and internationally. It offers its products for use in new material resins, silicones, lubricant oils and processing fluids, environmentally friendly coatings, high-end electronic chemicals, polyether amines, new composite materials, special fibers, agrochemical additives, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
General.Address: Zhangzhen Industrial New Zone, Shaoxing, China, 312363
